thread.title: The New "Despicable Me 3" Trailer Is Here And MINIONS
thread.title_full: The New "Despicable Me 3" Trailer Is Here And MINIONS

author: Michelle Regna
title: The New "Despicable Me 3" Trailer Is Here And MINIONS
text:
View this image ›
polygon.com ID: 10701039 2. But fret not minion devotees, because a new trailer was released today and it has way more Minion action than the first. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=euz-KBBfAAo . youtube.com ID: 10701405 3. Sure, the trailer is interesting for other reasons. For example, we learn that Gru gets fired from his job. Things are so bad that little Agnes SELLS HER UNICORN. View this image ›
Illumination ID: 10701413 4. And it turns out that Gru has a twin brother named Dru (also played by Steve Carell). View this image ›
Illumination ID: 10701424 5. But you came here for Minions, didn’t you? And minions you shall receive. View this image ›
Illumination ID: 10701426 6. Here’s a Minion riding a pig next to a Minion in snorkel gear. View this image ›
Illumination ID: 10701544 7. Here are Minions being typical Minions. View this image ›
Illumination ID: 10701566 8. And here they are trying to convine Gru to return to villainhood with a well-thought-out slideshow presentation. View this image ›
Illumination ID: 10701586 9. Banana! View this image ›
Illumination ID: 10701428 10. Despicable Me 3 hits theaters June 30. ID: 10701114 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
